name: Opinov8 Technology Services
description:
Opinov8 is a technology innovation partner, with an Opinion, which engages with our clients at any stage in their product engineering and development software pipeline. Focusing on business solutions being mainly full life-cycle development. We are driven by delivering business outcome, for our clients, through technological innovation. We are data driven in everything that we do and we aim shorten our clients Innovation Lifecycles, to drive Value through Innovation.
We are a young energetic and dynamically agile company and the team leading the business forward are software service industry veterans. We are ambitious on our own and on our client’s behalf. We do not look at a client engagement as a project, we are in it to help our clients build sustainable businesses. In other words; our clients’ business is our business. Being an Innov8or is what we strive to be, being curious, adventurous in Engineering and having a Technology Opinion is our DNA. We are head quartered in London, UK and have a development centres in Málaga, Spain and Kiev, Ukraine.
READ MORE...
